problem.p: The elastic bands, ropes, or cables used in a tensegrity structure resist:

p.em: "B Tree by Kenneth Snelson, Image Credit: takomabibelot/Flickr (CC BY-NC-ND-2.0)

choicegroup.label: The elastic bands, ropes, or cables used in a tensegrity structure resist:

div.p: The elastic bands, ropes, or cables used in a tensegrity structure resist tension only. The dowels resist compression.
